author: Rosie
name: GlobalBanList
install_msg:
Thank you for installing the GlobalBanList cog!
Do `[p]help GlobalBanList` to get the list of commands and their description. If you want to help translate, go to my [crowdin](<https://crowdin.com/project/Star-Cogs>)
If you like my work, [donate me!](<https://ko-fi.com/starcogs>)

This cog provides a powerful global ban list system with appeal functionality across multiple Discord servers!
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs for banned users and their associated ban reasons. It also temporarily stores appeal information submitted by users.
